short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if the website being visited had a data breach with a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple, open-source Chrome extension that lets users check if the website in the current tab was found in the data breach database.

The database used in this project can be found at https://haveibeenpwned.com/PwnedWebsites.

The GitHub repo for this project can be found at https://github.com/ktoanphan/pwned-notifier.

Feel free to contact the developer if you have any questions/suggestions. Thanks!
